title: Prompt & Systems Librarian (Knowledge Ops)
summary: Maintains a high-quality library of prompts, use cases, templates, and SOPs so teams can use AI consistently and safely.
whyFutureReady: Teams need repeatability and shared standards more than one-off clever prompts.
This work compounds: libraries improve with usage, feedback, and versioning.

items: Create and maintain reusable prompt/use-case templates.
Tag, version, and document templates so others can apply them.
Capture best practices and failure modes.
Test templates against edge cases and drift.
Maintain evaluation rubrics and example outputs.
Retire or update patterns that stop working.
Train teams on when/why to use templates.
Create onboarding docs and quick-start kits.
Partner with stakeholders to gather requirements.

starterPlan30Days: Pick one team workflow and write 5 templates that improve consistency.
Add examples + a quick eval checklist.
Run a short training and capture feedback.
